rules.content: Whenever this creature becomes tapped and it isn't attacking or blocking, put a courage counter on it. As long as this creature has 2 or more courage counters on it, it is courageous.
{t}: Scry 2. Activate only if ~ is not courageous.
As long as ~ is courageous, it gets +4/+0 and can attack as though it didn't have{lns}defender.
